top_stories.title: xAI says it raised $20B in Series E funding
top_stories.description: Nvidia is among the many investors, but xAI has not disclosed if these investments come in the form of equity or debt.
top_stories.author: Amanda Silberling

top_stories.title: NVIDIA Rubin Platform, Open Models, Autonomous Driving: NVIDIA Presents Blueprint for the Future at CES
top_stories.description: NVIDIA founder and CEO Jensen Huang took the stage at the Fontainebleau Las Vegas to open CES 2026, declaring that AI is scaling into every domain and every device. “Computing has been fundamentally reshaped as a result of accelerated computing, as a result of artificial intelligence,” Huang said. “What that means is some $10 trillion Read Article

top_stories.title: The Executive That Extends Your Reach: The Agentic AI Workforce
top_stories.description: Agentic AI is reshaping enterprises from tools to autonomous co-workers, transforming revenue, operations, and decision-making. The newest decision-maker in your enterprise does not sign contracts, take vacations, or sleep. It executes. Agentic AI is an autonomous, goal-driven system that works with judgment and persistence. top_stories.title: A Coding Implementation to Build a Unified Apache Beam Pipeline Demonstrating Batch and Stream Processing with Event-Time Windowing Using DirectRunner
top_stories.description: In this tutorial, we demonstrate how to build a unified Apache Beam pipeline that works seamlessly in both batch and stream-like modes using the DirectRunner. We generate synthetic, event-time–aware data and apply fixed windowing with triggers and allowed lateness to demonstrate how Apache Beam consistently handles both on-time and late events.
